name: Luxury Limo City
description:
Luxury Limo City is a new insane, crazy and classic limousine car driving 3d game in big city environment. Being a good driver, you have to follow the road while drift driving and check your driving skills. Drive with care as you will feel yourself to be a car driver simulator while doing 3d driving in the 3d city.
features:
• 3 Classic limousines including stretched out vehicles for real fun driving
• 3D Graphics of a complete city environment to roam around and find celebrities to pick up
• Customizable controls for an easy limo driving experience
• Different camera angles for clear visibility and a smooth gameplay
